title: Training Camp Odds & Ends
itunes:title: Training Camp Odds & Ends
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Colleen Wolfe, & Gregg Rosenthal – recap all the latest news from around the NFL including the Broncos quarterback camp struggles and Shane Ray's injury. The heroes then speed through a few training camp odds and ends before they recap Colleen’s exchange with Marshawn Lynch over the weekend.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
